Together, we will retake Congress and provide a vision of a free and confident America. With the right leaders, the right principles, and the right policies, I know we can get back on track to a brighter future. 

I know that is what all Americans want, and it starts right here.
In this moment of crisis, conservatives like you and I have to stand up and lead with COURAGE, with PRINCIPLE, with determination to restore our way of life at home and leadership around the world.
Instead of inflation, we had a booming economy. Instead of higher gas prices, we had American energy independence. Instead of chaos on the global stage, we had stability.

When we had leaders with the courage of their convictions and a heart for the people of our country, we were safer, we were happier, we were free. 

 ===> HELP ME TAKE BACK THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES
===> DONATE NOW: https://t.co/TP6qRcK61G
